definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: First of all, one should use Indian or Ceylonese tea.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你得用印度或者斯里蘭卡茶。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Sri Lanka became the centre of the earlier Theravada order of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，斯里蘭卡成了佛教早期派別上座部的中心。

sentences.english: He reaffirmed that his country firmly pursues the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 他重申，斯里蘭卡堅定地奉行一箇中國的政策。

sentences.english: Why in Srilanka? Build houses in India.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼是斯里蘭卡？在印度建房子呀。

sentences.english: Okra is a popular vegetable in Sri Lanka.
sentences.chinese: 秋葵在斯里蘭卡是很受歡迎的蔬菜。

sentences.english: Wen said China and Sri Lanka are friends who share each other's pains.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶說，中國同斯里蘭卡是患難與共的朋友。

sentences.english: Tea was transplanted from China to India and Sri Lanka.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹是從中國移種到印度和斯里蘭卡的。

sentences.english: Colombo is to western Sri Lanka as Kingston is to WHAT?
sentences.chinese: 可倫坡之於斯里蘭卡的西部，就如金斯敦之於什麼？

sentences.english: A city of extreme northern Sri Lanka on Palk Strait.
sentences.chinese: 賈夫納斯里蘭卡北部城市，位於保克海峽沿岸。

sentences.english: Dear Srilankan brother, please do not consider out restraint as a weakness.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的斯里蘭卡兄弟，請不要把我們的剋制當做軟弱。

sentences.english: The island of Sri Lanka, lies within the Indian Ocean, with the Bay of Bengal to the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 斯里蘭卡島，位於印度洋內，東北邊是孟加拉海灣。

sentences.english: He urges the government to undertake its own independent investigation.
sentences.chinese: 海恩斯敦促斯里蘭卡政府進行獨立調查。

sentences.english: These men are literally rebuilding the Sri Lankan railway.
sentences.chinese: 這些人正在勤勤懇懇地重建斯里蘭卡的鐵路。

sentences.english: As many as 100, 000 people are believed to have died in Sri Lanka's 25-year civil war.
sentences.chinese: 據信在這25年中大約有10萬人死於斯里蘭卡內戰。

sentences.english: Did you see that documentary on SriLanka?
sentences.chinese: 你看過那部關於斯里蘭卡的紀錄片嗎？

sentences.english: Sri Lanka is a protean and wonderful paradise.
sentences.chinese: 斯里蘭卡是一個千變萬化和精彩萬分的人間天堂。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
